i2c
Class U2CTransaction

java.lang.Object
  i2c.U2CTransaction
public class U2CTransaction
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds the information for a read or write transaction. Futhermore it helps handling unsigned bytes.

getUWord

public int getUWord(int index)
returns a word value of two bytes in the buffer.

Parameters:
index - int Index of the first byte. This byte is used as HI- and the following byte as LO-component.
Returns:
int 16-bit unsigned word value

setUWord

public void setUWord(int index,
                     int value)
sets a word value to two bytes in the buffer.

Parameters:
index - int Index of the first byte. This byte is used as HI- and the following byte as LO-component
value - int 16-bit unsigned word value
